channel.title: Marketing on Pozibl - the art of the possible
channel.description: Recent content in Marketing on Pozibl - the art of the possible

item.title: Fiber Location Checker
item.description:
Often when starting a project it can be hard to determine if there is a real market need for fiber to the home.

Many factors come into play and often an average take rate percentage is just used.

This means that the whole business case rests on build it first and they will come!.

This is a risky approach and can lead to a lot of wasted time and money.
